description: '''Abbasuddin Ahmed''' (27 October 1901 â€“ 30 December 1959) was a [[East Pakistani|Pakistani]] folk song composer and singer born in the [[Bengal]] province of [[British India]]. He was known for [[Bhawaiya]] folk song which is a style commonly found in [[Rangpur District|Rangpur]], [[Undivided Goalpara district]]  and [[Cooch Behar]].
